page.title: 18A SATURDAY IN THE LIFE OF
page.content: MARY BROWNE AGED 11 I woke up at about seven thirty and fed the animals,which include the dog,cat guinea pig and sheep.I had no breakfast.Then I took the dog for a walk.When I came back I had dinner which consisted today of sandwiches. { Afterwards I mowed the lawn.Then I {went down to the River Yeo and did {some canoeing.The canoe,which is a one {seater,is very stable and did not tip {over.After tea I fed the bullocks. MELANIE COLES AGED 10 I was in Exeter at my friend Justine's house.We went down the park by her house.We also did some drawing. We had dinner and tea there _{cheese {on toast,one crumpet,chips and a {beefburger.I didn't eat the {beefburger. { Later I watched cable T.V.
